Aroclor 1254.Definition: Organic Compound;Coolant;Plasticizer;Polychlorinated Biphenyl;Aromatic Hydrocarbon;Organochloride; Aroclor 1254 is a commercial mixture of PCBs with an average chlorine content of 54%. It is composed of mainly pentachlorobiphenyls (71.44%) and hexachlorobuphenyls (21.97%) and also includes mono-, bi-, tri, tetra-, hexa, and nonachlorinated homologs.
